questionnaire module¶

class questionnaire.Questionnaire(pu_items, peou_items, **data)[source]¶

Bases: mongoengine.document.EmbeddedDocument

A class representing a stored questionnaire for a user

Parameters:
  • perceived_usefulness_items (ListField(QuestionnaireResponse)) – Responses to the perceived usefulness items from TAM
  • perceived_ease_of_use_items (ListField(QuestionnaireResponse)) – Responses to the perceived ease of use item from TAM
  • good (StringField) – A description of what was good about the software according to the user
  • can_be_improved (StringField) – A description of what could be improved according to the user
append_answer(item, phrasing, answer)[source]¶

Appends an answer to an item within the questionnaire

Parameters:
  • item (QuestionnaireItem) – The item to which the answer refers
  • phrasing (boolean) – Whether the item is positively (True) phrased or negatively (False)
  • answer (string) – The answer to be appended
can_be_improved¶

A unicode string field.

good¶

A unicode string field.

perceived_ease_of_use_items¶

A list field that wraps a standard field, allowing multiple instances of the field to be used as a list in the database.

If using with ReferenceFields see: one-to-many-with-listfields

Note

Required means it cannot be empty - as the default for ListFields is []

perceived_usefulness_items¶

A list field that wraps a standard field, allowing multiple instances of the field to be used as a list in the database.

If using with ReferenceFields see: one-to-many-with-listfields

Note

Required means it cannot be empty - as the default for ListFields is []
